title: stuck at 60fps
body: in game uncapped fps. vsync turned off in game aswell as nvidia control panel. xbox gaming dvr turned off. still stuck at 60fps. all my games are stuck at 60fps but i only play league help me out plz

replies.body: If all of your games are having frame drops, then the culprit could be driver or hardware issues.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot and tune up your PC.  Reach out if you have any questions.

In that case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to get some logs, and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!
i did u guys respond every 3 days to my tickets lol

I looked at your ticket and it looks like we were waiting for a response back from you for those logs.  :/  We try to reply back as soon as we can.  Your specialist will have more context to help you get this figured out.  Good luck!
